desc: Enormously boosts BC, HC drop rates, 30% boost to all parameters, hugely boosts OD gauge fill rate, resistance against 1 KO attack after activating OD & 2 turn slight damage reduction from all types when BC collected exceeds certain amount

dictionary.lore: A crown that a certain man is said to have brought back from the underworld. While wearing that same crown, the man came back to life even after being fatally injured, and eventually went on to build a great empire. However, it is said that when he attempted to be coronated with a new royal crown he was cut by an infinite number of invisible blades, and suffered an agonizing death. The crown was later destroyed by a retainer, but was reformed by a mystical force, and is said to be in the hands of someone even now.

name: Ishkravol Crown
